## Qualifiers.Convert.validatedQualifierDecl variable

Converter which constructs a [validated qualifier declaration](./ts-res.qualifiers.ivalidatedqualifierdecl.md) from a [qualifier declaration](./ts-res.qualifiers.iqualifierdecl.md)<!-- -->, instantiating qualifier types by name from a supplied [conversion context](./ts-res.qualifiers.convert.iqualifierdeclconvertcontext.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
validatedQualifierDecl: import("@fgv/ts-utils").Converter<IValidatedQualifierDecl, IQualifierDeclConvertContext>
```
